response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This innovative solution offers unparalleled benefits and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it is worth significantly more than its production cost. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This opportunity is not only about acquiring a high-value item but also investing in future advancements and improvements that could greatly benefit your business. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 850000}
